text: Kare-ra wa arrā ni,`(warui koto wa) nani mo iwanai.' To chikau. Daga kare-ra wa tashika ni fushinjin'na hanashi o shi, 1-do isurāmu o ukeireta nochi fushinjin ni nari, jōju shi enai koto o takuramu. Arrā to shito ga, sono onkei ni yotte kare-ra o (senri-hin de) fuyū ni nasa rete iru koto ni taishite fukushū o shita nisuginai. Moshi kaigo surunaraba kare-ra no tame ni mottomo yoi. Moshi somuki sarunaraba, arrā wa gense demo raise demo itamashī chōbatsu de kare-ra o bassa reru. Kare-ra wa chijō ni, hogo-sha mo enjo-sha mo naidearou
